column5: Guys I am gearing up to make sure I have what is needed for my first trip up to quinte and understand that in november, reef runners and mann's 20 plus cranks are the goto cranks. Post up what your favorite colors and cranks are for quinte in the fall as I am sure I am not the only one that is learning!
The first three lures that hit the water are Reef Runners Wht/Purple Hot Tiger, Bengal Tiger and Mann's Dr.Death

Deep Taildancer #11- Purpledescent Manns Stretch 20+- Dr. Death, Chartreuse and Blueberry Muffin Reef Runner 800's- Eriedescent, Bubblegum, Chrome/Blue, Blueberry Muffin and Bare Naked to name a few. Guys have also been using the 900 Reef Runners with success but I personally haven't tried them yet. I will be picking some up to try for this fall though. FISH HUNTER
in addition to fish hunters fine selection of luresmay i add:#9 shad rap in black and silver blue
What about the other styles of Reef Runners? Do you guys use them or do they run too shallow?
yo keeklong time ago for fall fishing @ quinte i was led to the fact of :go big or go home so it is 800 or 900 series reef runnersfor mebluepscould be full of but it works for me
There doesn't seem to be alot of experimenting size wise come fall here. Bigger baits put fish in the boat on a very consistant basis so there really isn't much incentive to change. FISH HUNTER
Wondering if handliners work cranks as well in the fast water areas.
